title: My Menu
description: My Menu is desigend search, find and save recipies. It also has search parameters so a user can filter out undesired recipes

title: Tech Blogger
description: Tech Blogger allows users to write blogs and commment on any blog as well. This app was designed to show off my ability to have a backend with a database

title: Note Taker
description: Note Taker is designed to be a simple way to take notes. This app uses RESTfull routes for its back end, thought it stores notes client-side

title: 5 Day
description: 5 Day gives you a 5 day weather forcast for the city a user searches and will render the weather for today and the next 5 days.

title: Cure Your Boredom
description: Cure Your Boredom will generate a joke or an activity based on citeria a user give it. Your favorite of each kind will be saved as well
